logentry.author: david_db
logentry.msg: Update in YDDatabaseObject: getResults and getResultsAsAssocArray don't execute any field callback anymore. These methods return the results as fetched from the query. If you want to execute the fields callbacks for each result, you must use a combination of fetch and getValues. This modification was a big improvement to performance.
